column4: I am running Ubuntu 10.04.4 LTS  I used to run skype 64 but after the crash about 6wks ago, I have not installed Skype when I try now I only see the 32 bit version???
Skype for Linux is buggy anyway. Try removing skype and re-installing (fixed it for me)
It ran beautifully for me before, and after having a hdd and cd rom failure and loosing everything on the machine I finally got it up running again and I only install Skype, I am allergic to Windoze
w0rd. I've had trouble with Skype in the past. Sometimes it decides not to work.
